title: Naga warrior
data:
***Version [0.30](/0.30 "0.30")**: This article **may not be** up to date for the [latest stable release](/0.32 "0.32") of Crawl.*

*For a list of all nagas, see [list of nagas](/List_of_nagas "List of nagas").*

| naga warrior N [![Naga warrior.png](/images/d/d5/Naga_warrior.png)](/File:Naga_warrior.png) |                                                                                                                                                                                |
| ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ |
| [HP](/Hit_points "Hit points")                                                              | 49-100                                                                                                                                                                         |
| [HD](/Hit_dice "Hit dice")                                                                  | 10                                                                                                                                                                             |
| [XP](/XP "XP")                                                                              | 985                                                                                                                                                                            |
| [Speed](/Monster_speed "Monster speed")                                                     | 10 (move: 140%)                                                                                                                                                                |
| [AC](/Armour_class "Armour class")                                                          | 6                                                                                                                                                                              |
| [EV](/Evasion "Evasion")                                                                    | 9                                                                                                                                                                              |
| [Will](/Willpower "Willpower")                                                              | 80                                                                                                                                                                             |
| Attack1                                                                                     | 27 ([hit](/Attack_type "Attack type"): [plain](/Attack_flavour "Attack flavour"))                                                                                              |
| Attack2                                                                                     | 6 ([constrict](/Attack_type "Attack type"): [crush](/Attack_flavour "Attack flavour"))                                                                                         |
| [Resistances](/Resistance "Resistance")                                                     | [rPois+](/Poison "Poison")                                                                                                                                                     |
| [Vulnerabilities](/Vulnerability "Vulnerability")                                           | None                                                                                                                                                                           |
| [Habitat](/Habitat "Habitat")                                                               | Land                                                                                                                                                                           |
| [Intelligence](/Monster_intelligence "Monster intelligence")                                | [Human](/Category:Human_intelligence "Category:Human intelligence")                                                                                                            |
| [Uses](/Item_usage "Item usage")                                                            | [Weapons & armour](/Category:Weapons_armour "Category:Weapons armour") [Starting equipment](/Item_usage "Item usage") [Open doors](/Category:Open_doors "Category:Open doors") |
| [Holiness](/Holiness "Holiness")                                                            | [Natural](/Category:Natural_holiness "Category:Natural holiness")                                                                                                              |
| [Size](/Size "Size")                                                                        | [Large](/Category:Large_monsters "Category:Large monsters")                                                                                                                    |
| [Type](/Type "Type")                                                                        | naga, naga                                                                                                                                                                     |
| Flags                                                                                       | [Fighter](/Fighter_flag "Fighter flag") [See invisible](/See_invisible "See invisible") [Speaks](/Speaks "Speaks") [Warm-blooded](/Blood_temperature "Blood temperature")      |

|   |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 |
| - | ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
|   | A fearsome naga warrior clad in sturdy armour and wielding a mighty weapon.***“Amongst the deities and Asuras and celestial Rishis, O amiable lady, the Nagas are endued with great energy. Possessed of great speed, they are endued again with excellent fragrance. They deserve to be worshipped. They are capable of granting boons. Indeed, we too deserve to be followed by others in our train. I tell thee, O lady, that we are incapable of being seen by human beings.” -Mahābhārata, Santi Parva, Mokshadharma Parva, section CCCLX. ca. 500 B.C. trans. Kisari Mohan Ganguli, 1883. |

## Contents

- [1 Useful Info](#Useful_Info)
- [2 Spells](#Spells)
- [3 Tips & Tricks](#Tips_.26_Tricks)
- [4 History](#History)

## Useful Info

**Naga warriors** are stronger, beefier, and better equipped than ordinary [nagas](/Naga_\(monster\) "Naga (monster)"). They deal significant damage in melee, and can boost the melee damage of other nagas and salamanders nearby. You can find them throughout the [Snake Pit](/Snake_Pit "Snake Pit").

## Spells

| Spell set I |                                                 |                                                                                                           |
| :---------- | ----------------------------------------------- | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| Slot1       | [Spit Poison](/Spit_Poison "Spit Poison") (d16) | [Natural flag](/Spell_slot_flags "Spell slot flags"), [Breath flag](/Spell_slot_flags "Spell slot flags") |
| Slot2       | [Battlecry](/Battlecry "Battlecry")             | [Vocal flag](/Spell_slot_flags "Spell slot flags"), [Noisy flag](/Spell_slot_flags "Spell slot flags")    |

## Tips & Tricks

- Naga warriors are strong, high HP brutes. Try to soften or kill them at range. If things get sketchy, remember that all nagas move slowly - you can walk away. Also remember that nagas [constrict](/Constrict "Constrict"), which prevents movement.
- Much like [orc knights](/Orc_knight "Orc knight"), their Battlecry greatly amplifies the melee damage of all other nagas and salamanders in the area. Take care not to fight more foes than you can manage.
- Naga warriors often carry [kite shields](/Kite_shield "Kite shield") and [tower shields](/Tower_shield "Tower shield"). If you're looking for a shield, you may want to investigate the first floor of the Snake Pit.

## History

- Prior to [0.30](/0.30 "0.30"), naga warriors dealt 32 base damage in melee, and had a bit more HP.
- Prior to [0.29](/0.29 "0.29"), naga warriors had 25% more HP.
- In [0.28](/0.28 "0.28"), naga warriors were made more likely to get a "[good item](/Good_item "Good item")" shield.
- In [0.27](/0.27 "0.27"), naga warriors got increased damage (28 -> 32) and [Battlecry](/Battlecry "Battlecry"). Also, monster weapon penalties were removed, so all monsters attack faster with weapons.
html:
Naga warrior

From CrawlWiki
Jump to: navigation, search
Version 0.30: This article may not be up to date for the latest stable release of Crawl.

For a list of all nagas, see list of nagas.

naga warrior N 
HP 49-100
HD 10
XP 985
Speed 10 (move: 140%)
AC 6
EV 9
Will 80
Attack1 27 (hit: plain)
Attack2 6 (constrict: crush)


Resistances rPois+
Vulnerabilities None
Habitat Land
Intelligence Human
Uses Weapons & armour
Starting equipment
Open doors
Holiness Natural
Size Large
Type naga, naga
Flags Fighter
See invisible
Speaks
Warm-blooded
A fearsome naga warrior clad in sturdy armour and wielding a mighty weapon.

“Amongst the deities and Asuras and celestial Rishis, O amiable lady, the Nagas are endued with great energy. Possessed of great speed, they are endued again with excellent fragrance. They deserve to be worshipped. They are capable of granting boons. Indeed, we too deserve to be followed by others in our train. I tell thee, O lady, that we are incapable of being seen by human beings.”
-Mahābhārata, Santi Parva, Mokshadharma Parva, section CCCLX. ca. 500 B.C.
trans. Kisari Mohan Ganguli, 1883.

Contents

  • 1 Useful Info
  • 2 Spells
  • 3 Tips & Tricks
  • 4 History

Useful Info

Naga warriors are stronger, beefier, and better equipped than ordinary nagas. They deal significant damage in melee, and can boost the melee damage of other nagas and salamanders nearby. You can find them throughout the Snake Pit.

Spells

Spell set I
Slot1 Spit Poison (d16) Natural flag,
Breath flag
Slot2 Battlecry Vocal flag,
Noisy flag

Tips & Tricks

  • Naga warriors are strong, high HP brutes. Try to soften or kill them at range. If things get sketchy, remember that all nagas move slowly - you can walk away. Also remember that nagas constrict, which prevents movement.
  • Much like orc knights, their Battlecry greatly amplifies the melee damage of all other nagas and salamanders in the area. Take care not to fight more foes than you can manage.
  • Naga warriors often carry kite shields and tower shields. If you're looking for a shield, you may want to investigate the first floor of the Snake Pit.

History

  • Prior to 0.30, naga warriors dealt 32 base damage in melee, and had a bit more HP.
  • Prior to 0.29, naga warriors had 25% more HP.
  • In 0.28, naga warriors were made more likely to get a "good item" shield.
  • In 0.27, naga warriors got increased damage (28 -> 32) and Battlecry. Also, monster weapon penalties were removed, so all monsters attack faster with weapons.
Retrieved from "http://crawl.chaosforge.org/index.php?title=Naga_warrior&oldid=75150"

rawPage:
{{version030}}
{{list of | nagas}}
{{monster info}}

==Useful Info==
'''Naga warriors''' are stronger, beefier, and better equipped than ordinary [[naga (monster)|nagas]]. They deal significant damage in melee, and can boost the melee damage of other nagas and salamanders nearby. You can find them throughout the [[Snake Pit]].

{{monster spells}}

==Tips & Tricks==
*Naga warriors are strong, high HP brutes. Try to soften or kill them at range. If things get sketchy, remember that all nagas move slowly - you can walk away. Also remember that nagas [[constrict]], which prevents movement.
*Much like [[orc knight]]s, their Battlecry greatly amplifies the melee damage of all other nagas and salamanders in the area. Take care not to fight more foes than you can manage.
*Naga warriors often carry [[kite shield]]s and [[tower shield]]s. If you're looking for a shield, you may want to investigate the first floor of the Snake Pit.

==History==
*Prior to [[0.30]], naga warriors dealt 32 base damage in melee, and had a bit more HP.
*Prior to [[0.29]], naga warriors had 25% more HP.
*In [[0.28]], naga warriors were made more likely to get a "[[good item]]" shield.
*In [[0.27]], naga warriors got increased damage (28 -> 32) and [[Battlecry]]. Also, monster weapon penalties were removed, so all monsters attack faster with weapons.

[[Category:Naga]]
